text: 🚨PRC-backed threat actors are exploiting provider & customer edge routers to target #CriticalInfrastructure networks, including telecom, transportation, lodging, and military infrastructure. Check out our joint advisory and implement mitigations.🔗 https://t.co/9HIw8lQlg9 https://t.co/VVvvUebrTx

🛡️ We added Citrix NetScaler memory overflow vulnerability CVE-2025-7775 to our Known Exploited Vulnerabilities Catalog. Visit https://t.co/myxOwap1Tf & apply mitigations to protect your org from cyberattacks. #Cybersecurity #InfoSec https://t.co/RoAsd78WFH

🚨 Citrix just patched 3 critical NetScaler flaws—one (CVE-2025-7775) is already under active attack.  Hackers can hijack systems (RCE) or crash them. No workarounds, only updates.  Admins need to move fast.  Full details here → https://t.co/q6UGg8BAMJ

⚠️ Alerte CERT-FR ⚠️  La vulnérabilité CVE-2025-7775 est activement exploitée et permet d'effectuer une exécution de code arbitraire à distance sur toutes les versions de Citrix NetScaler ADC et NetScaler Gateway. Un correctif est disponible.  https://t.co/t1Jbz9kFnS

CISA just flagged 3 new actively exploited flaws—two in Citrix Session Recording, one in Git.  The Git bug (CVE-2025-48384) can let attackers run arbitrary code just by cloning a repo. Proof-of-concept exploit is already out.  Here’s what you need to know ↓ https://t.co/GC6Gj0ew55

🛡️ We added Citrix and Git vulnerabilities CVE-2024-8068, CVE-2024-8069, & CVE-2025-48384 to our Known Exploited Vulnerabilities Catalog. Visit https://t.co/myxOwapzIN & apply mitigations to protect your org from cyberattacks. #Cybersecurity #InfoSec https://t.co/0Huzp9iADZ

🚨 Critical flaw in Docker Desktop (CVE-2025-9074, 9.3/10) lets a malicious container escape and hijack the host.  On Windows, attackers can mount the full C:\ drive, read sensitive files, even escalate to admin. macOS safer—but not safe.  Patch now (v4.44.3). Details → https://t.co/6tQ7FURbFp

The bad news didn’t wait:  💥 Password managers cracked ⚠️ Zero-days exploited live ☁️ Clouds breached 🤖 AI risks emerging 🌐 Governments cracking down  This week’s cyber recap is unmissable → https://t.co/Fiwwe7XKkr

⚠️ Cyberattacks are shifting gears.  ➟ One crew hijacks GeoServer (CVE-2024-36401) to quietly sell your internet bandwidth.  ➟ Another builds PolarEdge, a 40k-device botnet hidden in firewalls & routers.  ➟ And “Gayfemboy” — a Mirai offshoot — spreads across industries to fuel https://t.co/kXeqcUQROl

Kudos to @DARPA and AIxCC participants for showing the power behind AI! AI-enabled software can help identify and patch vulnerabilities in source code to better protect our nation's critical infrastructure. https://t.co/v4xugv5tut
